item.description:
Title: Icarus: Great Hunts Campaigns
Genre: Action , Adventure , Simulation
Developer: RocketWerkz
Publisher: RocketWerkz
Franchise: Icarus , RocketWerkz
Release Date: Jul 17, 2025




About This Content

What to Expect:

  • New Boss Hunting Mechanics resulting in Legendary Weapon rewards

  • New Map Exclusive Great Hunt Bosses

  • Upgradeable Legendary Weapons

  • New Operations that modify your Open World

  • Great hunt-influenced Weapons, Tools, Armor, Traps, Modules, and Attachments

  • Unique arenas, customized to each individual Great Hunt Boss

  • Great Hunt Bosses properly incorporated into previous maps and expansions

Forge your own path and find your target

Every Great Hunt Campaign revolves around a nonlinear set of missions with a unique story to track down each boss. These campaigns can involve branching optional operations, and mutually exclusive choices. The decision you make can affect creature spawns, loot drops, unique crafting recipes, boss difficulty, and more.

Great terrors await

At the end of each hunt, new bosses unlock, each with new, unique powers, drawing essence from the exotics you’re here to extract.

Build and customize new Legendary Weapons

New materials dropped from the Great Hunt Bosses are highly valuable and sent back up to the Orbital Space Station for use in crafting new Legendary Weapons. Customize these powerful new weapons, each with 4 upgrade slots from 3 themed upgrade paths, leading to 81 unique combinations per weapon.

Unique Boss Arenas

Each of the Great Hunt Bosses can only be faced in their own domain, where the playing field tilts in their favor. These Arenas are hidden and will require your keen hunting skills to seek out their entrances across the wilds of Icarus.

More Great Hunts and Bosses over time

Icarus ‘Great Hunts’ Expansion will come with 3 Hunts to undertake right away, with one on Olympus, one on Styx, and one on Prometheus. As we update the base game and release more new content, we will continue to update the content and features provided by the Great Hunts Campaigns.

item.title: The Drifter
item.description:
Title: The Drifter
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: Powerhoof , Dave Lloyd
Publisher: Powerhoof
Release Date: Jul 17, 2025




About This Game

  • A Pulp Adventure Thriller from the minds that brought you Peridium and Crawl.

  • An engrossing roller-coaster of a story- Drawing on King, Crichton and Carpenter, with a dash of 70s Aussie grindhouse.

  • Point 'n Click or Controller- Unique twin-stick controls make The Drifter as comfy to play on the couch as at your PC.

  • Bursting with raw crunchy pixel art and high-impact animation .

  • Professionally voice acted , with a brooding dark-synth cinematic score .

Mick Carter's been drifting a while now- moving from job to job, never staying one place long. Jumping a box-car to his old home town, he witnesses a violent murder, is pursued by hi-tech soldiers, thrown in a reservoir and drowned.

And that's just the start of Mick's problems.

His consciousness ripped away, thrust back into his own body seconds before his death...

Framed for the killing he witnessed, tormented by his own past, and haunted by the feeling that something followed him back from the other side...

Follow Mick as he's sucked headfirst into a lunatic web of shadowy corporations, murder, and the thousand-year obsession of a madman.

The Drifter is our take on a classic 2d point and click adventure, with the brake-lines cut. The focus is on fast-paced storytelling, with puzzle-solving being the glue that ties it together. Mick's a practical guy, and so puzzles are down-to-earth too, designed to be unobtrusive, and give an investigative feel.

We're keeping the pacing quick and lean, you'll never be wandering around lost or confused- Mick is propelled through the story at a good clip, from one situation to another, with barely a moment to catch his breath. One minute you'll be crafting a Molotov cocktail from a bottle of over-proof rum, the next interrogating a crooked neurosurgeon before swinging from a high-rise window by a fraying extension lead.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The Drifter contains horror themes, pixelated violence and blood, frequent strong language, and mature themes such as homelessness and references to drug and alcohol abuse.

item.title: Drill Core
item.description:
Title: Drill Core
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Hungry Couch Games
Publisher: tinyBuild
Franchise: tinyBuild
Release Date: Jul 17, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Sep 12, 2024




About This Game

Join Our Elite Platform Manager Team at DrillCore!


Are you ready to lead a team of exceptional talent in one of the most challenging environments known to humankind? At DrillCore, we're not just mining minerals; we're safeguarding the future. We're looking for strategic minds and resourceful leaders to manage our cutting-edge operations. Do you have what it takes to make every decision count in the race to profits & earnings against climate collapse?

Your 'Exciting' Mission: Lead, Manage, Innovate

Strategic Leadership


As a Platform Manager at DrillCore, you'll oversee a dedicated team of miners, carriers, and guards. Your mission? Navigate them through perilous missions to extract vital minerals and power our drill platform. Every strategic decision will test your planning and resource management skills. You’ll report directly to your Sector Manager, he will make sure you keep the operation running smoothly, whatever the pressure you’re under.

Operational & Safety Excellence


Nighttime is when the real excitement begins. This is when the planet's fauna usually clash directly with our company’s safety commitments. Your job? To maintain profits while safeguarding both the lives of your crew and the biodiversity of the planet you’re drilling. Sometimes tough choices need to be made, and that’s why DrillCore equips you with state-of-the-art defensive turrets . Remember, it's NOT a crime against biodiversity if it’s self-defense.

Innovation and Adaptability


At DrillCore, no two challenges are the same. Unpredictable wildlife, evolving requirements, and ever-changing technologies will keep you on your toes. Adapt swiftly, allocate resources efficiently, and develop innovative strategies to overcome the unexpected. Your success unlocks new career opportunities and advancements, pushing the boundaries of what's possible.



Join us at DrillCore and become a part of a mission that matters. Apply your strategic mind, lead with confidence, and make a real impact. Are you ready to drill to the core?

item.title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
item.description:
Title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Teyon
Publisher: Nacon
Franchise: Nacon
Release Date: Jul 17, 2025




About This Game






Following RoboCop's decisive victory over Detroit's gangs, a new chapter unfolds in this standalone extension set after the events of RoboCop: Rogue City.

The New Guy in Town has been defeated, but the streets are still riddled with crime. A spark of hope comes from OCP’s latest project: OmniTower – a massive housing complex designed specifically to provide for the needs of the residents of Old Detroit.

But when a group of highly trained mercenaries armed with cutting-edge weapons takes control of the building and turns it into their deadly fortress, RoboCop must take action to put a stop to their plans and uphold the law.




Prepare to take on a new breed of enemies: OmniTower is packed with high-tech threats.

From flying drones to exploding bots and anti-personnel turrets, every floor is riddled with deadly traps, and heavily armed elite troops. Expect to face minigun-toting armoured squads, special forces equipped with jet packs or even katana-wielding foes who look more machine than man.




When it’s too late to shout ""freeze"", you can rely on RoboCop’s arsenal to cool down enemies' ambitions. Choose from a wide range of powerful weapons to serve Justice, including the iconic Auto-9 or the all-new Cryo Cannon.
Unleash RoboCop's unmatched strength to deliver devastating finishing moves – whether smashing an opponent’s skull against a concrete wall or into the nearest drinks vending machine.




Experience unique missions with familiar faces which reveal more of the storyline of Unfinished Business.

Before becoming RoboCop, he was plain old police officer Alex Murphy, brave and resolute, but all too vulnerable on the beat in Old Detroit. Discover a different side of the legendary law enforcer, voiced by Peter Weller.

Step into the big boots of ED-209 and make the mercs know the efficiency of the iconic urban pacifier in action. This time, criminals won’t have 20 seconds to comply.

Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Racing , Simulation , Sports , Early Access

About This Game

Get ready to experience the thrill of the race with The Karters 2: Turbo Charged!

Choose from a variety of killer weapons to take down your opponents and emerge victorious in intense local or global multiplayer races. With a selection of thrilling maps to choose from, you'll need to outsmart your rivals to claim the top spot on the podium. Gather your friends and see who has what it takes to be the ultimate karting champion in The Karters 2!

Key Features:

  • Split-Screen (up to 6 players!) with Split-Screen Online Support

  • Ghost Race with an option to download and share ghost data from Leaderboards

  • Steam Workshop support (1000+ mods already - Tracks, Characters and more)

  • Online support with dedicated servers

  • Ranked matchmaking support

  • Single-Player Campaign

  • Global Rankings (Leaderboards, Monthly ELO rankings, All-Time ELO Rankings, Tournaments)

  • 16 official Race Tracks

  • 6 Battle Arenas

  • Team VS Team (online and local)

  • Cups with up to 24 rounds (Team VS Team & Online support)

We are a small indie studio from Poland with a goal to create the best kart racing game on the platform!
